suggestions.original: To improve the line combinations in the artwork, consider refining the lines in the background elements such as the clouds and the sun to make them more cohesive and integrated with the rest of the scene. Additionally, ensure that the lines defining the characters and other elements are consistent in thickness and style to enhance the overall harmony of the piece. This will help create a more unified and visually appealing composition.
